intro: Make your career as a musician. Start as a street singer, become DJ in local pub, organize concert at a local hall, play at a largest music festival in your country.
description:
Game Features:
11 musical instruments to play on, on some you play music note by note, sound by sound, by clicking on string of guitar/piano key/ bashing drum sticks on drums or your hands on jambe, Musical Instruments have both prerecorded ready 5-10 chords of songs for you to play that you trigger by moving hand or clicking on piano keys or classic mode note by note where you play on instrument by clicking on string/piano key note by note triggering abcdefg major/minor and make your own song.
Guitar, Thrombone, Piano, Jambe, Violin, Harphe, Ukulele, Chimes, Drums, DJ Set

Each event lasts 5 minutes and then you come back to city map
You make your own live music playing on musical instruments using drum sticks, hand etc. note by note, sound by sound.
11 different locations unlocked based on followers: Rave Party, Luna Club, JazzManClub, ExtraPub, Press, Hiring Agency for musicians, Festival Organizer, Concert Hall, Street Singing, Music Publisher
Create your own band by hiring other musicians
Gain followers to unlock other locations, events, musicians
Followers gain is calculated based on audience fun during event
When you gain enough followers you become a worldwide-known musician, and you will see what happens then
Meet with publisher and get to top of band charts on contest with other bands
See progress of local music industry, with you in it in local press release
